benefit1.title: No-code integration
benefit1.description: Connect your data without needing to code. Our system adapts to your existing infrastructure.

benefit2.title: Enterprise security
benefit2.description: Your data stays secure with enterprise-grade encryption and full permission control.

benefit3.title: Real-time analysis
benefit3.description: Get instant insights from your data with conversational responses and intuitive visualizations.

benefit4.title: Guaranteed scalability
benefit4.description: From startups to enterprises, our infrastructure grows with your business.

mastraHighlight.title: Built on
mastraHighlight.description: LLMApps is developed with Mastra, the most advanced framework for creating conversational AI applications. Get the best of both worlds: the power of AI and simplicity of use.

testimonial1.quote: LLMApps completely transformed how we analyze our data. What used to take hours now takes minutes.
testimonial1.author: Maria Gonzalez

testimonial2.quote: The ability to converse with our data in natural language has revolutionized our decision making.
testimonial2.author: Carlos Rodriguez

testimonial3.quote: Incredible ease of integration. In less than a week we had everything running perfectly.
testimonial3.author: Ana Martinez

question1.q: What types of data can I connect?
question1.a: You can connect virtually any data source: SQL and NoSQL databases, Excel files, CSV, PDFs, REST APIs, and more. Our system is extremely flexible and adapts to your needs.

question2.q: Is it safe to connect my business data?
question2.a: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption, comply with international security standards, and your data is never shared with third parties. Plus, you have full control over permissions and access.

question3.a: Depending on the complexity of your project, basic implementation can be ready in 1-2 weeks. More complex projects may take 4-6 weeks. We always work to deliver value as quickly as possible.

question4.q: Do I need technical knowledge to use LLMApps?
question4.a: No, LLMApps is designed to be used by anyone. If you can write a text message, you can use our platform. The conversational interface is intuitive and natural.

question5.q: What kind of support do you offer?
question5.a: We offer complete support that includes initial training, detailed documentation, and ongoing assistance. Depending on your plan, you'll have access to email, chat, or even a dedicated account manager.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small teams getting started

question1.q: Can I change plans at any time?
question1.a: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan at any time. Changes apply immediately and you only pay the prorated difference.

question2.q: What happens if I exceed my query limit?
question2.a: We'll notify you when you approach your limit. You can choose to upgrade your plan or purchase additional query packages as needed.

question3.q: Do you offer discounts for non-profit organizations?
question3.a: Yes, we offer special discounts for non-profit and educational organizations. Contact us to learn more details.

question4.q: Does the free trial require a credit card?
question4.a: No, you can start your 14-day free trial without needing to enter payment information. You only need to create an account.
